name: Mitigation Playbook for Remote Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed scripts remotely through a vulnerable application, leading to data exfiltration.

parallel--4b92e2fc-8b91-4387-8331-f96d75.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--4b92e2fc-8b91-4387-8331-f96d75.description: Execute necessary mitigations in parallel to address the threat.

action--b3b8f7d5-85ed-4748-bf7b-6bfaef53.name: Identify and kill malicious PowerShell processes
action--b3b8f7d5-85ed-4748-bf7b-6bfaef53.description: Kill any PowerShell processes identified as malicious.

commands.command: ps aux | grep powershell | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9

action--ca4b7d19-944f-44b2-93b6-d9bd1a8f.name: Revoke network access for compromised hosts
action--ca4b7d19-944f-44b2-93b6-d9bd1a8f.description: Block network access for known compromised IPs.

action--27b403b4-566a-4b5e-9c3a-a020aabf.name: Scan system for residual malicious scripts
action--27b403b4-566a-4b5e-9c3a-a020aabf.description: Perform a comprehensive scan to find and remove any remaining malicious scripts.

action--7ea08d16-7f07-4e3f-8ea8-a4dda236.name: Update firewall rules to prevent similar attacks
action--7ea08d16-7f07-4e3f-8ea8-a4dda236.description: Modify firewall rules to prevent attacks from the malicious address range.

action--c161257f-c9e1-4672-96e6-7b0bada5.name: Restore system configuration files from backups
action--c161257f-c9e1-4672-96e6-7b0bada5.description: Restore important system configurations if critical files were affected.

conditions.condition: if hash clamscan 2>/dev/null; then restore; fi

action--f51d0ef3-b324-4e3c-a731-ce019249.name: Initiate security training for IT team
action--f51d0ef3-b324-4e3c-a731-ce019249.description: Send training invitations to the IT team to educate them on identifying suspicious activity.
